long_description: This Therm-a-rest Trekker Lounge Chair Kit has a built-in fleece pillow sleeve and covers your entire mattress to create a comfortable camping chair. Therm-a-rest Trekker Lounge Chair Kit features adjustable side straps and built-in fleece Stuff-It(R) pillow sleeve. Sets up in a snap; sleeve never has to be removed, so converts instantly from lounger to sleeping pad and back again. Therm-a-rest mattress (sold seperately).
short_description: This Therm-a-rest Trekker Lounge Chair Kit has a built-in fleece pillow sleeve and covers your entire mattress to create a comfortable camping chair.
